name: 6.11 "My Fair Clavin" Quiz / Test | 'Cheers'- Season 6 | 10 Questions

questions.text: When Cliff said he was going to make a life change, what did Carla say?
questions.explanation:
"You'd make a dorky woman too."

	Cliff had decided to move into a new condo now that he was living on his own. Carla didn't really care what he was doing and merely wanted to take yet another opportunity to pick on him.

questions.text: Who was smoking in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	Rebecca was a smoker years ago and had quit. However, she was very stressed out lately so she started smoking once again.

questions.text: Who was the woman that Cliff liked?
questions.explanation:
Sally.

	Sally was played by Karen Akers. She was known for her role as Kitty Haynes in "The Purple Rose of Cairo" in 1985.

questions.text: What show did Cliff and his lady friend watch?
questions.explanation:
Jeopardy!.

	Cliff an avid lover of trivia and loved "Jeopardy!" He was kind of embarrassed about the way Sally looked, so he never wanted to take her out of his apartment.

questions.text: What did Frasier suggest for the smoker to quit smoking?
questions.correct: To do the most repulsive thing s/he could think of if she smoked again
options: To come to him for therapy
To replace the cigarettes with a lollipop
questions.explanation:
To do the most repulsive thing s/he could think of if she smoked again.

	Rebecca told Sam, "If I smoke one more cigarette, I'll go to bed with you." Sam then tried everything to catch her with a cigarette.

questions.text: What did Cliff call his lady friend when she had make-up on?
questions.explanation:
a fox.

	Cliff went out on his balcony and yelled "I got a fox!" What he didn't count on was other men would find her attractive as well.

questions.text: What did Cliff tell his lady friend that Cheers was?
questions.explanation:
a dive.

	He told her this when she wasn't wearing make-up so she wouldn't want to go there. But when she told him it wasn't a dive he said he meant "below street level".

questions.text: Who did everyone at the bar think Cliff's lady friend was?
questions.explanation:
his cousin.

	No one could understand why a beautiful woman would go out with Cliff. Then they all started thinking something was mentally wrong with her.

questions.text: Where did the smoker hide his/her cigarette at one point?
questions.explanation:
in his/her mouth.

	Rebecca was smoking when Sam opened the door. She quickly flipped the cigarette in her mouth so it was hidden.

questions.text: Did Sam sleep with Rebecca in this episode?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Rebecca said she would go to bed with Sam even though she didn't want to. Sam turned her down because she "wasn't in the spirit of this whole thing".
